entry.title: ecoclean blizzard
entry.summary:
Vendor: IGL
Type: soap
Price: 32.95

Paintwork Safe:
PPF & Vinyl Safe: 
Surface: All surfaces

Ecoclean Blizzard is our ultra-luxurious high foaming exterior shampoo. It lifts dirt and dissolves impurities by adhering on the surface gently. Using sustainable raw ingredients, the concentrated formula allows for a lesser usage and a higher coverage, saving time and costs. Can be used as a pre-wash.

entry.title: ecoshine F3 – Finish ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: IGL
Type: Polish
Price: 34.99 - 72.99 (2 variants)

Paintwork Safe:
PPF & Vinyl Safe:
Surface: All paintwork, plastic and glass

 

ecoshine finish f3, is a nanotechnology based nano-abrasive based finishing formula with high performance polishing agents. The amount of cut is is excellent especially when used with an aggressive pad with minimal concern of the ecoshine finish f3 drying out. It is highly efficient at creating a very deep flawless finish and removal of P4000-P5000 sand scratches. Results are highly dependent on the hardness of the treated paints. It may be used both on oxidized surfaces and new fully dried paints. When using ecoshine finish f3 on softer paint system, finish f3 is able to correct without any hazing remaining.

entry.title: IGL Coatings Wool Yarn Compounding Pad 9 inch***
entry.summary:
Vendor: IGL
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 40.35

This is a specially designed compounding and buffing pad made from 100% twisted wool. It has double sides so it is very easy to use and allows the user to buff and compound quicker and get into difficult to reach areas without damaging the surface.

 

Features & Benefits: 
– 100% twisted wool yarn 
– Easier to access hard to reach areas 
– Excellent for heavy duty compounding and buffing

Technical Data: 
– Double Sided
– For use with M14 adaptor
– Rotary Polisher Only 
– Recommended RPM 1250 – 1750 
– Rotary Max RPM 2,500
– Handwash only

entry.title: IGL Coatings Microfibre Pads Yellow***
entry.summary:
Vendor: IGL
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 14.25 - 18.75 (3 variants)

Microfiber Cutting

The IGL Microfiber Cutting Pads are produced using the same foam used on the IGL Foam pads. The microfiber surface are created using a specific grade of Korean microfiber to create a fast and efficient cutting job. The pads are designed to provide maximum durability on long throw dual action and rotary machines. The pads are tapered to ensure additional safety when working with long throw polishers, while the top part are created with an exact fit to the backing plate, providing a much more equal distribution of pressure on the surface of the pads which provides a much more efficient cutting, polishing or finishing.

 

The pads are also easily centered with the innerhole design, which also serves as a point to dissipate heat. The IGL Pads are a part of the IGL Abrasive system, and are designed to work very efficiently with the IGL Compound F1, Polish F2 and Finish F3. The end results are less heat, less dusting, less clogging of the pads and longer durability of the pads.

 

The Microfiber Cutting Pad is great for heavy imperfection correction work.

entry.summary:

Type: Towel

IGL Coatings Removal towel is a super soft short pile microfiber towel that is very effective in removing coating residue without causing marring on the coated surface.  This feature is thanks to the special knitting used in the microfiber towel that allows the coating to be removed with minimal tack.

Microfiber, pack of 10

Ultra smooth microfiber towel, 300 gsm, 16 x 16 inches

entry.summary:
Vendor: IGL
Type: Paint Protection
Price: 22.95 - 129.95 (3 variants)

All surface ecoshine enhancer, is a waterbased, zero VOC nanotechnology hybrid quick detail formulation with superb durable hydrophobic and gloss enhancing effect that is safe to be applied to all parts of your vehicle. It creates a surface that is slick, glossy and protected. ecoshine enhancer can be used when the vehicle is dry or when it is still wet after a wash. When used after a wash, it aids drying.

entry.title: IGL Coatings Ecocoat Poly - available for approved detailers only***
entry.summary:
Vendor: IGL
Type: Paint Protection
Price: 134.95

All paintwork surfaces ecocoat poly is our original REACH compliant high solid ceramic coating which is synthetised with our proprietary modified active material, carrier and nanotechnology to be free from any carcinogenic chemicals. The result is an increase in the paint’s reflectivity and also resistance against harsh chemicals, micro marring and dullness that last up to 1 year.

entry.title: IGL Coatings Ecocoat Premier***
entry.summary:
Vendor: IGL
Type: Paint Protection
Price: 89.95 - 549.95 (2 variants)

All non-absorbent surfaces ecocoat premier is a REACH compliant zero VOC, hydrophobic silica coating which is water based and can be applied on all non-absorbent surfaces of the vehicle. It is a highly efficient and produces immediate impactful result on the coated surface. The result is a coated surface that is non-smearing, non-yellowing, high gloss, high slick and dirt repelling that will last for up to 6 months.

All polycarbonate surfaces ecocoat headlight is a highly effective REACH compliant UV absorber and gloss enhancer ceramic coating for polycarbonate headlights. The result is that micro marrings are hidden, it increases clarity and absorbs UV for up to 1 year.

entry.title: IGL Coatings Ecocoat Leather***
entry.summary:
Vendor: IGL
Type: Leather Treatment
Price: 103.95

Description
Natural and artificial leather ecocoat leather is a REACH compliant 100% breathable, low VOC, non etching silica coating. It crosslinks with the surface of the leather via nanotechnology to create an invisible layer that repels undesirable liquid, dirt, dye and UV-radiation. It can be applied on virtually any treated leather. The result is protection against unwanted liquids, dirt and stains without altering the flexibility, appearance or texture of the coated surface.
30mL
Ecocoat Leather – 30ml kit

entry.title: IGL Coatings Ecoshine Wax***
entry.summary:
Vendor: IGL
Type: Paint Protection
Price: 74.95

Ecoshine wax is a 100% pure carnauba wax formulated into a solid compound based on nano-scaled silane and siloxane technology that simultaneously cleanses, rejuvenates & protects automotive paint. ecoshine wax refreshes weathered paint finishes & removes micro scratches by filling super fine scratches & swirl marks on existing paint work. In addition to this, a ultra thin premium organic carnauba wax layer that bonds to painted surfaces strongly is applied. This results in an extremely reflective, hydrophobic surface that is extremely easy to clean, repels water, oil and dirt that that can last up to 3 months.

entry.title: IGL Coatings Ecoshine Paint***
entry.summary:
Vendor: IGL
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 29.95

**This product is now a “ready to use” product not the concentrated product previously available**

Ecoshine paint, is a waterbased, zero VOC nanotechnology spray-on/ wipe off cleaner which safely removes surface contaminants & leaves your car absolutely spotless. It is designed to ‘lift’ dirt away while the powerful surfactants break down road grime. The added silane creates a smooth & protected finish with less dirt pick up.

500mL
